divs: Sighting DetailsOn the morning of Wed.24 Jan 2001 I woke at 05:10, sitting up and lookingoutthrough our East facing window (we sleep with curtains open) I observedwhat Ifirst took to be a star, my attention was drawn by its unusualsparklingappearance akin to a sparkler -firework, it then began to move in avery jerkyfashion, not unlike the flight of a butterfly, the generaldirection of movementwas South to North. I woke my wife (a skeptic) who,when I showed her, had toagree it was indeed a UFO. We continued to observeuntil it disappeared from ourview - still travelling Northward. The morning was not yet fully light, Therewas only a little wispy cloud above the object, and the whole sighting lastedabout five minutes.
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Leicester
There were no other sightings in Leicester on or around January 24th 2001
